1�Register for a union?No.Yes.
1�What will you do?Nothing.Transfer to another union.Resign union membership.

1�Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.
1� �[Transfer unions/Resign from your current union]?No.Yes.

1�Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.
1� �[Transfer unions/Resign from your current union]?No.Yes.

1�I am afraid that all unions are currently at their maximum enrollment, and unable to accept new recruits.For better or for worse, though, I suspect it shall not be long before we are in need of some new blood.Such is the nature of war...

1�Good show on your last operation. Now go make an official report to Sir Rasdinice.

1�Nice job on your last operation. Now don't forget to report back to Emhi Tchaoryo!

1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.
1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the San d'Orian Provincial Knights.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the Bastokan Legion.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the Federation of Windurst.
1�Greetings. I am 	, Campaign Arbiter for the Allied Forces.
1�What can I help you with?Nothing.Performance assessment.New Allied Tags.Temporary items.Union registration.Teleportation.Information on the Allied Campaign.
1�You've already undergone an evaluation for this battle, or had you forgotten?As much as I'd like to, I'm forbidden from providing you with a new set of Allied Taegs until the next battle begins.

�!�I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.

�!�I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.
1�Understood. I shall now judge your performance and award the proper remuneration.
1�Understood. I shall prepare a new set of tags for you now.
1�Let me show you the list of items currently available to you.

1�Select a category:Quit.
�-Note Items.
-Note Items.
-Note Items.

1�You currently possess 
' Allied Note?'[/s].
1�Proceed with the transaction?Yes.No.
y.�Register for a union?Yes.No.
1�What will you do?Nothing.Transfer to another union.Resign union membership.

1�Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.
1� �[Transfer/Resign] from your current union?Yes.No.

1�Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.
1� �[Transfer/Resign] from your current union?Yes.No.

1�I am afraid that all unions are currently at their maximum enrollment, and unable to accept new recruits.For better or for worse, though, I suspect it shall not be long before we are in need of some new blood.Such is the nature of war...

1�Complete transaction and return to capital?Yes.No.
1�What would you like to know?Nothing. I'm sorry.About performance assessment.About Allied Tags.About temporary items.About Unions.
1�Anyone wearing Allied Tags while participating in a campaign battle will be judged on their overall performance.
1�Soldiers will be evaluated not only on their fighting skills, but also on how much they contribute to the efforts of their allies through means such as healing and enhancing.
1�However, beware that if you leave the area before being assessed, you will be deemed a deserter and will forfeit all rewards earned that day.
1�Also, while there are no immediate penalties for being knocked out, falling in battle will significantly lower the score given to you.
1�When you are ready to receive compensation for your work on the field, return to me and I shall assess your performance and provide you with your payment.
1�That is all.
1�Allied Tags are a special type of identification given to all participants of Allied Campaign battles.
1�There are benefits, as well as drawbacks, to wearing the tags. One of the benefits is that in the case you are knocked out on the battlefield, you will not lose any experience points.
1�However, some of the drawbacks include the inability to improve skills and earn experience points for individual kills, as well as the right to loot fallen enemies.
1�That is all.
1�Temporary items can be purchased in exchange for Allied Notes.
1�There are several different varieties of items, but they all have one thing in common--they can only be used on the battlefield they were issued.
1�It is highly recommended that you first survey a battle's conditions and then select the supplies that you believe will benefit you most.
1�Please remember that all temporary items you carry on your person will be confiscated in the event that you leave the area.
1�That is all.
1�Oh ho! Keen to join a Union, are we?Very well. Listen up and I shall tell you all you need to know.

1�In order to better coordinate Allied efforts against the beastman menace, we have instituted a system of ad hoc tactical regiments called ??Unions.?? With five units to a battlefield, union registration is open to any proven soldier in possession of Allied Tags.
1�In return for their aid in advancing the war effort, union registrants will be eligible to earn a share of the spoils of war.

1�Needless to say, the choicest rewards will be reserved for those unions which make the greatest contributions in combat.Prove your mettle on the field of battle, and you will earn glory for your union, as well as a sizable bounty of your own.

1�Be forewarned that your commitment to your union comes first and foremost.In the aftermath of battle, you will not be permitted to reap rewards from your individual exploits until your union has distributed its plunder.
1�That is all.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Traitor in the Midst(pt.1).Traitor in the Midst(pt.2).Traitor in the Midst(pt.3).Traitor in the Midst(pt.4).Traitor in the Midst(pt.5).Traitor in the Midst(pt.6).Betrayal at Beaucedine(pt.1).Betrayal at Beaucedine(pt.2).On Thin Ice(pt.1).On Thin Ice(pt.2).Dungeons and Dancers(pt.1).Dungeons and Dancers(pt.2).Dungeons and Dancers(pt.3).Dungeons and Dancers(pt.4).Distorter of Time(pt.1).Distorter of Time(pt.2).The Will of the World.Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.1).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.2).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.3).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.4).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.5).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.6).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.7).Beneath the Mask.Fork in the Road.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1� ! Lilisette! Can you hear me!?
1�Ceithir. At what turn did you go astray? Lost your way?
1�Yes, yes. The will of Altana is absolute. No room to argue.
1�Agreed. Shame, though, that we failed to locate our feline kinsman. Location unknown.
1�It-it swallowed her up!? Gulped her down!?
1�...The Champions of the Dawn shall descend.??
1�These...these young ones are--?
1�The torch, we pass on to you, young ones. Carry on our legacy.
1�Do you realize the graveness of your actions? Your misdeeds?Dha, Ochd, and Sia--their blood is on your paws.
1�Eek! What are we to do!? Oh, Goddess deliver!
1�...in radiance blessed...??
1�But we know you won't let us down! Shan't disappoint!
1�All in one, and one in all... Such is the essence of our being.Rebellious thoughts and behavior are not permitted. Zero tolerance.
1�Keep your heads about you, people! Maintain composure!
1�With wings divine...??
1�This, too, is the will of the Goddess. Altana's will be done.
1�Ugoggh, ugaga, ugagueggha!
1�Hahaha! I knew I recognized that earnest expression!
1�Still relying on numbers to win your battles, Zogbog?
1�The enemy procession approaches from the direction of Tavnazia.
1�Sir! The enemy--they come!
n!�La di da di da?`??
1�The Champions of the Dawn shall descend...??
1�What unsavory game are you playing at, hmmm? Up to no good, I'll wager!
1�Naoi! Do you read me, Naoi?I've stumbled upon a conspicuous cave opening not a stone's throw away from where we passed by earlier.
1�Could it be that it leads underground? An entrance to the caverns?
1�Extreme situations call for extreme measures. Drastic action.
1�Everyone! Remember the words of Altana! The wish of the Goddess!
1�Could this really be true? Truly be real?
1�Why continue this vain struggle? Throw down your arms, and you shall be gifted with quick deaths.
1�What's this? A futile attempt at a frontal breakthrough?Oh, please! Mock me not with such puerile strategies!
1�(The enemy chooses resistance! Show them not an onz of quarter!)
1�(Reinforcements!?)
e!�What!? You again!?

1�Ever fond of dramatic entrances, I see. But now that you're here, what do you hope to achieve? I'd dearly like to see you try and tip the scales against my newly formed ??Invincibles??--all ten ponzes of you, gahahaha!
1�Friends, you say? Spare me your japes!Scrawny little halflings like you can come in the hundreds of thousands and still not--
1�K-Klythios!? How...how could this be!?By what foul means were the Gigas mercenaries made to defect!?
1�(Artillerists! Return fire!)
1�(Wh-what!? Snow-covered boulders!?)
1�(C-curses!)
!)�(Confound that hell-spawned brat!Next time we meet, I swear I'll rip off--)
1�L-Lord Excenmille!
1�It concerns your father Count Aurchiat, sir!
1�M-my lord! Waaait!
1�I believed in my heart that you would come,  . Thank you.
1�<Huff, puff...>C-Captain. Doumienne's squad, too, has been decimated.The Orcs...they will not be stayed for much longer.
1�Has there been no word from Viscount Dieuffon?
1�Yes, ma'am!
1�Excenmille.
1�So we manage to meet again.
1�Hehehe... Not once, Excenmille... Not once...

1�I must admit, it touched my heart to see that a gentle mien thrives beneath that fearsome exterior. After such an experience, one cannot help but wonder if the beastmen are really that different from us.
1�V-Viscount Dieuffon!
1�May the Goddess watch over you...
1�It would be my pleasure. Let us do it this way, then.
1�Each reconnaissance squad shall comprise two scouts.Captain Gissenne, if you and Altennia could form the first squad, I would place the western area in your charge.
1�And you two ladies, I would be most obliged if you could center your activities around the eastern reaches of the glacier.
1�Attend me well, one and all!Few in number as we are, the outcome of this operation rests entirely upon our herding of the enemy to death's door.
s!�Hm? And what might these be?
1�Judging from their enormity, they are that of Gigas, I'd wager.
1�But see how several identical sets seem to pace to and fro...Does this not strike you as odd?
1�( . Pretend nothing is amiss.)
1�(We are being watched from the shadows. Likely an enemy scout.)
1�(Let us entrap the fiend. I shall maneuver to the opposite side, while you position yourself within the tower's shade.)
1�(Await my signal to pounce on the prey.)
..�Gone!? But whither...?
1�Why do I find you standing here before me? Were you not bound for Tavnazia in the company of Count Aurchiat and the Cardinal Stags?
1�That is regrettable...And what of the count and his knights? How do they fare?
1�It gives me heart to learn that all is well with the Cardinal Stags.Speaking of which, why are you not with them? What business have you here on your own?
1�Very well. A large enemy host has been spotted marching through Batallia Downs.Our purpose here is none other than to lay an ambush.
1�Hm? 'Tis obvious you possess knowledge we do not, and I would thank you to share it with us.
1�The Bloodwing Horde, you say? The unit led by the Kingslayer; the same that laid siege to San d'Oria?This truly bodes ill...
1�I shall take word of this back to base camp and await Captain Gissenne's return. Thence, we shall draw up the finer details of the operation.
1�Meanwhile, I require you to examine the peculiar footprints and report back with your findings.I shall see you back at base camp.

!!�Upon our parting, I returned to base camp only to be greeted by this carnage.It appears we were overrun by the Bloodwing Horde before the camouflage could be completed. I fear the ambush operation has failed.
1�The Carmine Swallows are nowhere to be seen, but Captain Gissenne isn't one to abandon her post.
1�The others cannot be far from here. We must find them and regroup.
1�Altennia!
1�Excenmille, what unholy manner of covenant did you enter into with that Gigas?
1�Positively intriguing...
1�Such a sight is balm for the soul, is it not?
1� . I haven't much to offer you out here in the field, but please accept this token of my appreciation.The assistance you afforded to young Excenmille proved pivotal to our victory, so I'm told.
1�It seems an awful shame to let them go. Their presence could well steer the course of conflict.
1�Hm? Would that there be a knight come to replace the departing Gigas?
1�Altennia. It would seem an ill wind blows to mar today's triumph.
1�But war is no kind master--no respite does he offer the weary.I must needs march on to Xarcabard to join the Royal Knights.
1�Please give Captain Gissenne my regards. Farewell, and be safe!
1�I cannot claim to be well acquainted with this region, and would feel most comfortable entrusting this matter to you, Lieutenant.
1�I know full well. Yet we cannot relinquish this position, lest the Allied Forces' northern expedition be jeopardized.
1�As yet, nothing. But until there is, we shall surrender no ground to the enemy.
1�Assume arrowhead formation!
1�The enemy stands distracted! Now is our chance to strike!Carmine Swallows, chaaarge!!!
!?�It pleases me to see the two of you in good trim, Phillieulais,  .
1�Hmm...the answer would make for a rather lengthy story.
1�To put it simply, both the reason and means for our foray to Tavnazia have been lost.
1�All in the unit are hale and hearty, thank you for asking.As a matter of fact, they're headed for Xarcabard to join with the Royal Knights even as we speak.
1�Rest assured, I'm here not for some frivolous undertaking such as the building of snowmen.And I might ask the same question of you.
1�An enemy host? That rings a bell or two...

1�I know the enemy battalion of which you speak. In fact, I've been on its trail for quite some time now.The targets of your ambush are elite Bloodwing Horde soldiers under the command of one Zogbog.
1�What's this talk of footprints?
1�My experience in Vunkerl does not lie. These prints belong to Gigas.
1�And not an awfully bright herd, from the look of things.They've gone and gotten themselves royally lost, the hapless dunces!
1� ! Take cover!
1�(The bent big toe on the big fellow there looks to be a match with a set of prints...)
1�(Hm!? It couldn't be...)
1�( , lend me your ear.)
1�(Earlier, I espied many a promising fishing spot nearby to here.)
1�(I need you to go there this instant and catch one each of the following:)
1�(With regards to bait, you'll find that %???? work like a charm.There's a healthy colony of them in a craggy area to the southwest.)
1�(We haven't time for explanations. Trust me for now.)
1�Ah, you've returned,  .Let's see what manner of delights you have in the fish hamper...
1�Good Goddess, look at those little rascals squirm! Now that's what I call fresh! You've done well,  !
1� . This time I need you to take the hamper to the cliff edge north of here. Once there, you are to grill the contents to a crisp.
1�You'll be needing these: a portable grill, a tinderbox, some firewood, and...
1�Blast!
1�I had a mind to lend you my trusty #????, had it not found a new home when I packed it in a snowball and flung it at a straggling band of Orcs.
1�But the Young Griffons were nothing if not resourceful, and you,  , were among its most decorated members.I have every confidence you'll find a substitute #????.
1�I'll have you know that I've brought friends to the party.
1�Falcon Squad, prepare to launch!
1�Next! Eagle Squad, prepare to launch!
1�Their main ranks have been thinned! Falcon Squad, concentrate fire!
1�I owe you yet again,  . This time, for grilling the catch of the day, of all things.
1�Thanks to you, I was able to lure the other Gigas away and be reacquainted with my old friend Klythios here.
1�Klythios, you have my thanks. This victory, we owe to you and your comrades.I look forward to when next we go head-to-head...with fishing rods in hand!
